# Search for directions and estimated travel time between locations

**Web Service Endpoint**

Find directions by specific criteria.

## Discussion

### Example



## Directions

- **Determine estimated arrival times and distances to one or more destinations**: Returns the estimated time of arrival (ETA) and distance between starting and ending locations.

items.description: Returns the estimated time of arrival (ETA) and distance between starting and ending locations.
